name: Sample Case 3: Charge-Off with Proper Dates
description: A de-identified example showing a charge-off account with properly reported dates (no flags expected).
raw_text:
CHARGE-OFF ACCOUNT

Creditor Name: FIRST NATIONAL CREDIT UNION
Account Type: Charge-Off
Account Status: Closed

Date Opened: 06/15/2017
Date of First Delinquency: 02/28/2019
Date of Last Activity: 02/28/2019
Charge-Off Date: 08/15/2019

Original Balance: $3,200
Current Balance: $3,200

Estimated Removal Date: 02/2026

Reported by: Equifax

original_creditor.source_text: Creditor Name: FIRST NATIONAL CREDIT UNION

furnisher_or_collector.source_text: Creditor Name: FIRST NATIONAL CREDIT UNION

notes: This sample shows a properly reported charge-off account. The DOFD is 02/2019, and the estimated removal date of 02/2026 is approximately 7 years later, which is correct. The date opened (2017) is before the DOFD, which is proper.
